details.publicNotes: Silent apart from the clanks of their armor, this steel-wrapped pony advances on you, bringing the hooked tip of their lance to bear.

description.value:
Trigger An ally within reach Strikes

Effect You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.UHpkTuCtyaPqiCAB]{Step} and if that puts you within reach of the enemy the ally was Striking, you may Strike it.
Not allowed to remove their armor, they are always @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued}.
When attempting an Athletics check to [[/act trip options=tandem-trip]] a creature while an ally is adjacent to them, you roll twice and take the better result.
